name: Toureon: Giant Ancient Mech
description:
Toureon is a 3D VR first-person melee combat game. The game is set in a futuristic São Luís (see more information about the city in the Extras section of the game), mixing elements of the historic city with modern ones from large urban and technological centers. 

The battle takes place in the city’s historic center, where the player should take control of a giant robot to face a fearsome enemy, a mystical monster with the sole purpose of causing destruction. The player will experience the battle from the perspective of the cabin interior, from where he/she will use the action commands to make the robot walk, attack, and defend.

In this duality rises a giant mystical creature, born from the combination of old spirits and the pollution caused by humans. Its final goal is to destroy the city, thus saving the environment. Amid the chaos and fear, a champion and a sleeping giant rise to protect the city. Toureon, a huge robot created with ancestral technology, was kept a secret until the moment was right. The hero shall command the robot from inside a control cabin in order to contain the monster’s fury and save the innocent citizens.
